system.description: Warforged have the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-hindrances.IQgZkCUMklDKYV9x]{Outsider} (Major) Hindrance. With a long history of being dedicated soldiers of war, warforged have difficulty blending into post-war Khorvaire. Most non-warforged strongly dislike the sight of warforged as they stand as living reminders of the horror that was the Last War. As such, warforged have −2 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} rolls when interacting with non-warforged and are often treated as less than.

Warforged have the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-hindrances.IQgZkCUMklDKYV9x]{Outsider} (Major) Hindrance. With a long history of being dedicated soldiers of war, warforged have difficulty blending into post-war Khorvaire. Most non-warforged strongly dislike the sight of warforged as they stand as living reminders of the horror that was the Last War. As such, warforged have −2 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} rolls when interacting with non-warforged and are often treated as less than.
